messages.subject: Re: Andersen Family Unschooling Adventures
messages.msgSnippet: Lynda, ... to ... I ve heard that as well.  I didn t see the movie though, so I don t have any more specific information.  While you re in Portland, you may
messages.messageBody:
Lynda,

> John, can I pick your brain <g> The kidlets love "The Shining" and want
to
> stay at the hotel it was filmed in. I understand it is at Hood Mountain,
> do you know if this is true or not???

I've heard that as well. I didn't see the movie though, so I don't have any
more specific information. While you're in Portland, you may want to stop
at the Oregon Museum of Science and Industry. Children usually love to go
there.

> P.S. Is is o.k. to print out your essays??

Sure, I love to hear that people like my work. You may print up as many as
you'd like.

John Andersen
http://members.xoom.com/joandersen

messages.subject: Andersen Family Unschooling Adventures
messages.msgSnippet: From time to time I plan to write up trip reports on some of our Friday family homeschooling adventures.  Here s one about a trip we took yesterday to Salem,
messages.messageBody:
From time to time I plan to write up "trip reports" on some of our Friday
family homeschooling adventures. Here's one about a trip we took yesterday
to Salem, Oregon.

John Andersen
Portland, Oregon

http://members.xoom.com/joandersen/salemtrp.html

messages.subject: Re: Andersen Family Unschooling Adventures
messages.msgSnippet: John, can I pick your brain   The kidlets love The Shining and want to stay at the hotel it was filmed in.  I understand it is at Hood Mountain, do you
messages.messageBody:
John, can I pick your brain <g> The kidlets love "The Shining" and want to
stay at the hotel it was filmed in. I understand it is at Hood Mountain,
do you know if this is true or not??? It was back in the dark ages that I
lived in Portland and only remember that you head north from CA and hang a
right when you reach Portland. Guess I won't get a job too soon as a
navigator %-}

Oh, that is a sorry excuse and terribly unclear %-{ I should have said
that we will be traveling up your way in about 2 to 4 weeks and that was
why we were interested. :::sigh::: I didn't come by the title of "CAM"
without lots of hard work!

Lynda

P.S. Is is o.k. to print out your essays?? The kidlets hate to read
things on the computer and instead like to carry them around and dig
through books or look at maps when they are reading about some place.
Thanks.

----------
> From: "John O. Andersen" <andersen@...>
>
> >From time to time I plan to write up "trip reports" on some of our
Friday
> family homeschooling adventures. Here's one about a trip we took
yesterday
> to Salem, Oregon.
>
> John Andersen
> Portland, Oregon
>
> http://members.xoom.com/joandersen/salemtrp.html
